entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:46 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:39 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries becoming mixed with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:39 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:39 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
